grade_comment:
Grade: 90

Comment: The response accurately summarizes the command of Jesus to His disciples to make disciples of all nations, baptize them, and teach them to obey His commands. It effectively ties this command to the Great Commission found in the Gospel of Matthew. The only improvement could be adding a bit more depth or personal reflection on the importance and significance of the mission of discipleship within the context of spreading the message of love and guidance that Jesus exemplified.
